about_me.title: About me
texts: I am a self-taught 21-year-old junior front-end developer.

Despite not having prior work experience in this field, I have been committed to self-learning and have honed my skills through various projects and challenges. My passion for technology and desire for self-improvement compelled me to pursue a career in front-end development.

qas.question: What experience do I have in front-end development?
qas.answer: While I don't have prior work experience in front-end development, I have worked on several projects and gained a wealth of experience through self-learning. These projects encompassed various technologies and frameworks, preparing me to be ready for the challenges of front-end development.

qas.question: What kind of job am I looking for?
Which UI library do I use for my projects?
